application_singleton_alert_message.message: The {APPLICATION_NAME} application is already running. Please close it first and try again.

application_small_description.message: Ledger Wallet manages your Bitcoin and Litecoin accounts efficiently and securely.

apps_coinkite_cosign_errors_missing_api_.message: You must enter your API credentials in the settings.

apps_coinkite_cosign_errors_request_canc.message: The signature request has been cancelled by the user.

apps_coinkite_cosign_errors_wrong_nano_t.message: This Ledger Nano is not a cosigner of this transaction. Impossible to continue.

apps_coinkite_cosign_fetching_info.message: The cosignature transaction is being analyzed

apps_coinkite_cosign_index_note_footer.message: The request reference is shown on the cosign page (user request)

apps_coinkite_cosign_index_note_header.message: With this tool you can cosign a multisignature transaction with your Ledger Nano.

apps_coinkite_cosign_show_note.message: If you confirm the signature, this transaction will be signed by your Ledger Nano and sent to Coinkite.

apps_coinkite_cosign_signing_already_sig.message: This transaction has already been signed by this Ledger Nano and processed by Coinkite.

apps_coinkite_cosign_signing_info.message: The transaction is being signed by your Ledger Nano

apps_coinkite_cosign_signing_success_inf.message: The transaction has been successfully signed and sent to Coinkite server.

apps_coinkite_dashboard_compatibility_ch.message: Before to use our Coinkite multisignature app, please verify that your Ledger Nano is compatible.

apps_coinkite_dashboard_compatibility_fa.message: Your Ledger Nano is not compatible. You must reset it: enter a wrong PIN three times in a row, and restore your seed. Make sure you have your recovery sheet before doing that, otherwise you will lose your %s!

apps_coinkite_dashboard_compatibility_in.message: Verifying compaibility of your Ledger Nano with P2SH

apps_coinkite_dashboard_compatibility_su.message: Your Ledger Nano is compatible with multisignature.

apps_coinkite_dashboard_compatibility_wa.message: WARNING: if the test fails, you'll have to unplug and replug your Nano.

apps_coinkite_keygen_errors_cancelled.message: The request has been cancelled by the user.

apps_coinkite_keygen_errors_derivation_f.message: Fail to compute extended key. Please contact support.

apps_coinkite_keygen_index_info.message: Do you wish to export to Coinkite an extended public key? It will add the Nano as a signing device for the vault you are creating.

apps_coinkite_keygen_processing_info.message: Computing extended public key for Coinkite

apps_coinkite_keygen_show_note.message: Use this information to import this Ledger Nano as a key for your Coinkite multisignature wallet. The derivation path is useful to manually restore the xpub from your seed.

apps_coinkite_settings_note.message: Be sure to activate the cosign permission for this key.

common_errors_cannot_create_account_subt.message: Creating new accounts is not allowed while "%s" is empty. Please send funds to this account or consider deleting it.

common_errors_change_derivation_error.message: A hardware error happened during the transaction preparation. Please contact support immediately.

common_errors_deleting_this_paired_smart.message:
By deleting this smartphone, you will no longer be able to manually validate transactions of this Ledger Wallet.
Do you want to continue?

common_errors_dust_transaction.message: The transaction amount must be at least %s.

common_errors_error_during_synchronizati.message: The Ledger API (gateway to the blockchain) is having some network issues and the Ledger Wallet app cannot fully synchronize the transactions. Your %s are safe and the disruption of our API only has an impact on what the application can display.

The information displayed on the application will not be up-to-date, some transactions may be missing, and creating new transactions will not work. It is possible to get your real time balance and make payments using alternative methods.

common_errors_error_occurred.message: An error occurred. Please try again later.

common_errors_fees_too_high.message:
Warning, the selected transaction fees seem to be notably high.
Do you confirm this amount (%s)?

common_errors_fees_too_low_cpfp.message: Fees are too low to accelerate the transaction

common_errors_fill_all_fields.message: Please make sure that all fields are filled in.

common_errors_going_to_firmware_update.message:
By switching to firmware update mode, all your pending activites will be interrupted.
Do you want to continue ?

common_errors_invalid_amount.message: The amount to send is invalid.

common_errors_invalid_op_return_data.message: The OP_RETURN data is invalid (must be HEX)

common_errors_network_no_response.message: The transactions server did not respond.

common_errors_not_a_valid_email.message: The email address does not seem to be valid.

common_errors_secure_screen_invalid_pin.message: The smartphone returned a wrong pin code.

common_errors_transaction_already_confir.message: This transaction is already confirmed and does not need to be accelerated. Please click on the refresh button if the transaction is still displayed as unconfirmed.

common_errors_unsufficient_balance.message: The balance of your wallet is too low.

common_errors_wrong_transaction_signatur.message: The transaction has not been signed correctly due to hardware fault. Please contact the support for immediate assistance.

common_get_help.message: Please visit our help center at support.ledgerwallet.com for more information.

common_help_thank_you_message.message: Thank you for contacting the support team. We'll get back to you shortly.

common_may_take_a_while.message: Please wait, this operation may take a few moments.

common_qrcode_nowebcam.message: No webcam is detected on your computer.

common_qrcode_present.message: Present the QR code in front of the webcam.

common_wait.message: Please wait, this may take a few minutes.

onboading_common_help.message: Need assistance ? Contact Ledger support team.

onboarding_device_chains_bad_device_mess.message: This device does not support Bitcoin Cash

onboarding_device_chains_bitcoin_cash_wa.message: It is recommended to use your coins on a different account on the Bitcoin Cash chain. Select the "Main" option to transact using your main Bitcoin account and initially transfer your coins to a dedicated account, or the "Split" option to transact using a dedicated account.

onboarding_device_chains_message1.message: Several Bitcoin chains are available on the network. Some may have their own transaction history,

onboarding_device_chains_message2.message: account balances and may impact the content of your wallet. Note that the Bitcoin Cash chain

onboarding_device_chains_message3.message: requires that you have the dedicated app open on your device.

onboarding_device_chains_message4.message: If you do not know what to do, tick "Remember my choice" and click on "Bitcoin"

onboarding_device_chains_recover_message.message: This tool has been designed to recover BTC that have been wrongly sent to the BCH Split address. Do not use this tool if you are not in this situation.

onboarding_device_chains_segwit_message.message:
Following Segregated Witness activation, you can now create a new address format with several benefits: lower fees, faster signatures, and enabling second layer solutions. It is recommended to switch your receiving addresses to this new format, and migrate your legacy funds by creating a transaction to a Segwit address.
Click here for more information.

onboarding_device_chains_title.message: Which Bitcoin chain do you want to use ?

onboarding_device_unsupported_please_upd.message: To use or generate a security card, please update your hardware wallet firmware.

onboarding_device_update_new_1_0_0.message: This update adds a new authentication method to validate outgoing transactions on your smartphone.

onboarding_device_update_new_1_0_1.message: This update adds P2SH support and fixes critical (but not threatening) bugs in the crypto library.

onboarding_device_update_new_1_0_2.message: This version fixes spurious reinitialization bugs, adds Segwit and Bitcoin Cash signature support, and optimizes the performance of cryptographic operations.

onboarding_device_update_new_1_0_3.message: This update fixes Segwit transaction handling for non multisig transactions

onboarding_device_update_new_1_0_4.message: This update fixes Segwit & Bitcoin Cash transaction handling

onboarding_device_update_new_firmware_av.message: A new firmware update is available for your Ledger Wallet (%s).

onboarding_management_cancel_wallet_conf.message: Do you want to cancel the configuration of your Ledger Wallet?

onboarding_management_done_error_occured.message: A serious error occured. Please contact support for further assistance.

onboarding_management_done_unplug_plug.message: Unplug then plug back your Ledger Wallet to access your accounts and %s.

onboarding_management_done_you_can_acces.message: You can now access your wallet safely.

onboarding_management_pin_confirmation_e.message: Re-enter the PIN code chosen in the previous step

onboarding_management_pin_confirmation_p.message: The entered PIN code does not match the one chosen in the previous step.

onboarding_management_pin_to_protect_you.message: This 4 digits code allows you to secure the access of your wallet

onboarding_management_pin_warning_weak_p.message: your birth year or your debit/credit card pin are not secure PIN codes.

onboarding_management_provisioning_dont_.message: Do not unplug your Ledger Wallet from the USB port of the computer.

onboarding_management_security_by_clicki.message: By clicking CONTINUE, you confirm to use a trusted computer to configure your Ledger Wallet.

onboarding_management_security_line1.message: This configuration wizard handles highly sensitive data about your wallet.

onboarding_management_security_line2_cre.message: It is very important to continue the creation process from a private (or trusted) computer to prevent someone from accessing these information illicitly.

onboarding_management_security_line2_oth.message: It is very important to continue the recovery process from a private (or trusted) computer to prevent someone from accessing these information illicitly.

onboarding_management_security_line3.message: In case of doubt, we recommend that you remove your Ledger Wallet from the USB port of the computer and reopen this wizard from another more secure computer.

onboarding_management_security_trusted_c.message: A trusted computer is required to configure your Ledger Wallet

onboarding_management_seed_confirmation_.message: Enter the words associated with the following two numbers from your recovery sheet

onboarding_management_seed_given_word_gr.message: This set of 24 words was provided to you when creating your wallet

onboarding_management_seed_it_wont_be_di.message: Your recovery phrase won't be displayed again.

onboarding_management_seed_usecase_word_.message: This set of 24 words allows you to recover your wallet in case of loss or forgotten PIN code

onboarding_management_seed_without_it.message: Without it, you will not be able to access your %s in case of loss.

onboarding_management_seed_write_down_yo.message: Write down your recovery phrase in the given sheet

onboarding_management_summary_by_clickin.message: By clicking FINISH, you confirm that you have chosen a secured PIN code and written down your recovery phrase.
By clicking FINISH, you confirm that you have chosen a new secured PIN code.

onboarding_management_summary_during_the.message: During the operation, do not unplug your Ledger Wallet from the USB port of the computer.

onboarding_management_summary_use_your_b.message: In a few moments, you will be able to use your %s in the fastest possible way

update_done_successfully_updated.message: Your Ledger Wallet has been successfully updated.

By clicking CONTINUE, you confirm to be in possession of your 24 words recovery phrase.
If you attempt to update your Ledger Wallet without it, you will lose your %s.

update_error_problem_persists.message: If the problem persists, visit our help center at support.ledgerwallet.com.

update_index_clicking_continue.message: By clicking CONTINUE, you confirm to be in possession of your security card QR code and your 24 words recovery phrase. If you attempt to update your Ledger Wallet without this information, you will lose your bitcoins.

update_index_please_note.message: Please note: You will need to pair your smartphone again to re-enable mobile second factor authentication.

update_index_update_process.message:
The update process need to erase your Ledger Wallet.
Your recovery sheet will allow you to restore your %s.
